meta.title: Missing in Alaska
meta.description: Alaska, 1972. Two congressmen vanish on a small plane. They’re never found. In 1995, a mobster tells the F.B.I. the plane was bombed. What happened?
meta.author: iHeartRadio

episodes.title: The Transcript
episodes.description: A shocking story, as told to investigators in 1994.

episodes.title: Bananas in Tucson
episodes.description: A mobster marries the widow of one of the missing men.

episodes.title: Bonus: A Day on the North Slope
episodes.description: The pilot’s account of a previous Arctic crash.

episodes.title: The Search
episodes.description: Battling snow and waves, searchers hunt for the missing plane.

episodes.title: The Disappearance
episodes.description: Two congressmen vanish in Alaska in 1972.

episodes.title: Introducing Missing in Alaska
episodes.description: Alaska, 1972. Two congressmen vanish on a small plane. They’re never found. In 1995, a mobster tells the F.B.I. the plane was bombed. What happened?
